1.title: Anchors Aweigh

episode of.title: The Adventures of Captain Callie (TV Series 2017)

1.plot: Follow the adventures of Captain Callie and her crew as they explore hidden treasures on Whidbey Island through dance, song, and storytelling. Anchors aweigh.

2.title: Pollution Revolution

episode of.title: The Adventures of Captain Callie (TV Series 2017)

2.plot: Captain Callie and her crew learn about the three R's: Reduce, Reuse and Recycle. We're going green.

3.title: A Whale of a Tale

episode of.title: The Adventures of Captain Callie (TV Series 2017)

3.plot: Mariah makes up a story about a bizarre creature living on Whidbey Island. She later realizes that honesty is the best policy.

4.title: The Shipnic

episode of.title: The Adventures of Captain Callie (TV Series 2017)

4.plot: Captain Callie and her crew learn that too much junk food can make one sick and how a balanced diet is good for your health.

5.title: Ocean of Emotion

episode of.title: The Adventures of Captain Callie (TV Series 2017)

5.plot: Captain Callie and her crew find solutions to stop bullying and how to deal with emotions, both good and bad.

6.title: Friend Ship

episode of.title: The Adventures of Captain Callie (TV Series 2017)

6.plot: Captain Callie and her crew discover new friendships and rediscover old ones.

imdb.plot outline: A nautical themed children's show that follows the adventures of Captain Callie and her crew mates as they explore hidden treasures of Whidbey Island. With an emphasis on imagination, positivity, and whimsy, The Adventures of Captain Callie will entertain and delight through dance, song, and storytelling. Anchors aweigh.
